title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.21 - Yearly audit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.21 - Yearly audit

State Regulations

Account wagering licensees shall audit or cause to have
audited the account wagering system data input and account updates not less
than once during each calendar year. Such reports shall be provided to the
commission upon request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4500.21

Amended

New

York State Register July 26, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 30, eff. 7/26/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
